pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Alvin API ClientAlvin API Client is a sdk package developed at Alvin. This is a dependency package for Alvin CLI and is installed during installation of the CLI package. Find the - Alvin CLI [here](https://pypi.org/project/alvin-cli)- Alvin [docs](https://docs.alvin.ai)- Request Invite [here](https://www.alvin.ai)
